author: Karlo
install_msg: This cog **requires** you to manually install `click==8.0.3` before it can load since Red currently uses an older version. If you don't know how to do this, please uninstall this cog.
end_user_data_statement: This cog stores a Discord user's Battle.net authenticator details like the secret, serial and recovery keys. Users may delete their own data by making a data removal request.
